text: François-Philippe Champagne (born June 25, 1970) is a Canadian politician who was the Minister of Finance since 2025. He became the Minister of Innovation, Science and Industry in 2021. Champagne was the Minister of Foreign Affairs from 2019 until 2021. He is a member of the Liberal Party. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Quebec
title: François-Philippe Champagne
